synopsis.text: Yao Ling and Hu Xiaozhen were childhood friends who parted ways due to a misunderstanding. When they reunite as young adults at the academy, Yao Ling hopes to restart their sweet romance. However, mysterious supernatural events begin occurring, orchestrated by the enigmatic administrator Ma Shen. Ma Shen manipulates Yao Ling and Hu Xiaozhen into becoming "acting administrators" who help lingering spirits fulfill their unrealized dreams. In exchange, the couple can continue developing their own relationship. As they experience mission after mission together, Yao Ling and Hu Xiaozhen's bond deepens. Yet Ma Shen has ulterior motives tied to the secret workings of the world. As Yao Ling and Hu Xiaozhen uncover more about these mysteries and dangers, their love is tested like never before. Will they find the courage and compassion to help the spirits while choosing each other? Or will Ma Shen's machinations tear them apart for good?
